website_summaries.verdict: A mid-sized Speed Champions set that also has a mid-level price. The perfect choice for Ford lovers of all ages.
pros: Features both classic and modern Ford GT models with 3 minifigures
Has numerous graphics and accessories for simulating races
Lots of attention to detail – even adult Ford enthusiasts are impressed with the cars
cons: Some consumers wish it didn't have so many small stickers, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: A fun lego for the more mature builder
customer_reviews.text: My son got a ton of Legos and other presents for Christmas and this remains his favorite. Having the throw-back car and the newer one is cool. The SPEED Legos do a good job for my son who has grown up a little and more interested in these vs the sets for younger kids. He's 10 and getting intereted in cars and technology more than the cartoon sets he used to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan hale

customer_reviews.title: Fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these race car sets. Fun to put together, and then sturdy enough to play with afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the best place to shop LEGO!
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Always perfect pieces and perfect LEGO set! We could not find this anywhere, but Amazon! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: LemoMama

customer_reviews.title: Rockin Lego Speed Cars  -- Get'em before the lot is empty
customer_reviews.text: Great looking roadsters, they much better than Hotwheels. I have 5 in this series and each one has its own unique style in both colors and bricks. I would even recommend for your adult Lego fans. Because you race'em or just display them at your office. You never go wrong with Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Hueneme_Beachboy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: My dad has been talking for a while about how he wants to buy a Ford GT (like the real one). It's a pipe dream. That car purchase isn't happening. He got a good kick out of it when I got him the LEGO version for Father's Day. He put them together and now keeps this set in his office.
customer_reviews.author: longhorn1114

customer_reviews.title: Minus one star due to the amount of stickers.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, somewhat challenging builds. Minus one star due to the amount of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love LEGO Speed Champion sets
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t put it together yet since it’s a Christmas gift but we have a few of the LEGO Speed Champion sets and they have all been perfect. My boys love them and can’t get enough, I’m glad this one was such a good price compared to the other sets I’ve seen
customer_reviews.author: A321

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young - or young at heart!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my fiance for fun, and he loved it! The instructions were easy and the final product looks great! 10/10 would recommend for children and adults who are young at heart!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ford history
customer_reviews.text: 1 star deducted for price, but this set is awesome and so real to life. Love Lego champions and now I can battle it out with my Ferrari set like in the movie!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeOne

customer_reviews.title: Great set, as all Lego sets are.  My Grandson Loved it and enjoyed building the cars.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Grandson...just because. He had seen it in the store but I waited to purchase it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Must have set
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite sets. Very interesting building techniques and some of the coolest cars that speed champions has done.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy

customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Said he put it together in one day.

customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a Lego set that has my son's favorite cars in it

product_meta.title: LEGO Speed Champions 6175279 2016 GT & 1966 Ford Gt40 75881 Building Kit (366 Piece), Multi
product_meta.description: Get set for a historic race with LEGO Speed Champions versions of the stunning 2016 Ford gt and 1966 Ford GT40 endurance cars. Each car features space for a racing driver minifigure, wheels with rubber tires, removable windshields and iconic details. With a race marshal minifigure plus a victory podium with a gold-colored trophy and checkered flag element, there’s everything needed to role-play a modern vs. Classic 24-hour race. Includes 3 minifigures.
feature_bullets: Includes 3 minifigures: 2016 Ford gt racing driver, 1966 Ford GT40 racing driver and a race marshal

The race-ready, buildable 2016 Ford gt and 1966 Ford GT40 cars each feature a minifigure cockpit, wheels with rubber tires, removable windshield, plus authentic colors, design details and race-graphics stickers
Accessory elements include 2 racing driver helmets and the race marshal’s flag
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 7+

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
